name: Space Breaker (itch)
description:
Use the arrow keys up and down to move

and smash through asteroids.

Avoid white asteroids at all costs because its very easy to collide with them.

The bigger the asteroid the more points/damage it would give.

[POST JAM] Watch out for enemies beacuse they'll try everything to stop you!!   Their life drains by accidentally destroying the asteroids and packs of health come after they die.

Simple enough!! Smash through as many asteroids as possible while accelerating in this endless game.

Made for the 2 color game jam in less than 48hrs enjoy!!
